title: (x) The White House logo and stationary - Goudy Old Style {Nick J}
content:
Hey, I am glad I found this website! My friends have wondered for a couple of years now and we never could find the answer to our question...

What is the type of font used for the White House logo and stationery?

Thanks!!
author: tgalvin

comments.content:
Do you mean [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20130414051456/http:/www.whitehouse.gov/news/releases/2005/03/images/20050316-3_p44599-107jpg-515h.html) one?

I think it's [Goudy Old Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20130414051456/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=UR.109870.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=32&sampleText=THE+WHITE+HOUSE&sampleSize=32).
